attributes.action: prevent job sites and recruitment agencies using the word 'fun' falsely in job specs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Searching for a fun job or one that isn't as banal as the next has become impossible due to recruitment agencies listing jobs and work places as 'fun' (or similar words). 

words such as these should only be used for jobs that are going to be fun. 'Fun' being an objective concept, naturally.

- example; Admin jobs - never going to be fun.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
